verses.roman:
āra dina raghunātha svarūpa-caraṇe
āpanāra kṛtya lāgi' kailā nivedane

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; svarūpa-caraṇe—unto the lotus feet of Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; āpanāra—his; kṛtya—duty; lāgi'-for; kailā nivedane—submitted.
translation: The next day, Raghunātha dāsa inquired at the lotus feet of Svarūpa Dāmodara about his duty.
